title: Falling In Love With Islam: Handbook 1 - Essentials of Islam
description: The perfect coming of age gift from a Muslim parent to their child. On recognizing the dire need of the present time, this series of Handbooks are being compiled; as a clear, unambiguous compilation of the Beliefs & Rationale of Islām. Handbook 1 is focused upon the essentials & fundamentals of Islam. As per the Qur’ān and Sunnāh; what our Beliefs as a Muslim entail; Likewise, it also highlights the Rationale of Islām in regard to its requisites & obligations.
author: Ra'ana Khan
